member.name: T:Dommel.DommelMapper
member.summary: Simple CRUD commands for Dapper.

member.name: M:Dommel.DommelMapper.Get``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Object)
member.summary: Retrieves the entity of type with the specified id.
member.param: The connection to the database. This can either be open or closed.
The id of the entity in the database.
member.returns: The entity with the corresponding id.

member.name: M:Dommel.DommelMapper.GetAll``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves all the entities of type .
member.param: The connection to the database. This can either be open or closed.
A value indicating whether the result of the query should be executed directly, or when the query is materialized (using ToList() for example).
member.returns: A collection of entities of type .

member.name: M:Dommel.DommelMapper.Insert``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0)
member.summary: Inserts the specified entity into the database and returns the id.
member.param: The connection to the database. This can either be open or closed.
member.returns: The id of the inserted entity.

member.name: M:Dommel.DommelMapper.Update``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0)
member.summary: Updates the values of the specified entity in the database. The return value indicates whether the operation succeeded.
member.param: The connection to the database. This can either be open or closed.
member.returns: A value indicating whether the update operation succeeded.

member.name: M:Dommel.DommelMapper.Delete``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0)
member.summary: Deletes the specified entity from the database. Returns a value indicating whether the operation succeeded.
member.param: The connection to the database. This can either be open or closed.
member.returns: A value indicating whether the delete operation succeeded.

member.name: M:Dommel.DommelMapper.GetTableName(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets the name of the table in the database for the specified type using an implementation.
member.returns: The name of the table in the database for the specified type.

member.name: M:Dommel.DommelMapper.GetColumnName(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Gets the column name in the datbase for the specified property uing an implementation.
member.returns: The name of the column in the database for the specified property.

member.summary: Sets the implementation for resolving key properties of entities.

member.summary: Sets the implementation for resolving table names for entities.

member.name: T:Dommel.DommelMapper.IKeyPropertyResolver
member.summary: Defines methods for resolving the key property of entities. Custom implementations can be registerd with .

member.name: M:Dommel.DommelMapper.IKeyPropertyResolver.ResolveKeyProperty(System.Type)
member.summary: Resolves the key property for the specified type.
member.param: The type to resolve the key property for.
member.returns: A instance of the key property of .

member.name: T:Dommel.DommelMapper.DefaultKeyPropertyResolver
member.summary: Implements the interface by resolving key properties with the [Key] attribute or with the name 'Id'.

member.name: M:Dommel.DommelMapper.DefaultKeyPropertyResolver.ResolveKeyProperty(System.Type)
member.summary: Finds the key property by looking for a property with the [Key] attribute or with the name 'Id'.

member.name: T:Dommel.DommelMapper.ITableNameResolver
member.summary: Defines methods for resolving table names of entities. Custom implementations can be registerd with .

member.name: M:Dommel.DommelMapper.ITableNameResolver.ResolveTableName(System.Type)
member.summary: Resolves the table name for the specified type.
member.param: The type to resolve the table name for.
member.returns: A string containing the resolved table name for for .

member.name: T:Dommel.DommelMapper.DefaultTableNameResolver
member.summary: Implements the interface by resolving table names by making the type name plural and removing the 'I' prefix for interfaces.

member.name: M:Dommel.DommelMapper.DefaultTableNameResolver.ResolveTableName(System.Type)
member.summary: Resolves the table name by making the type plural (+ 's', Product -> Products) and removing the 'I' prefix for interfaces.

member.name: T:Dommel.DommelMapper.IColumnNameResolver
member.summary: Defines methods for resolving column names for entities. Custom implementations can be registerd with .

member.summary: Resolves the column name for the specified property.
member.returns: The column name for the property.

member.name: T:Dommel.DommelMapper.DefaultColumnNameResolver
member.summary: Implements the .

member.name: M:Dommel.DommelMapper.DefaultColumnNameResolver.ResolveColumnName(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Resolves the column name for the property. This is just the name of the property.
